title: Eroxion bt based on?
content:
Eroxion was designed by Eduardo Manso in 1997.  
 [https://www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/eroxion/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317171503/https:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/eroxion/ "https://www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/eroxion/")  
I've already ruled out the usual suspects of Impact and Compacta, but would like to know if it was based on an existing font or not. Thanks!

Font: 

 Helvetica Inserat (Linotype) 

Solved By: 

 [kthomps5](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317171503/http:/typophile.com/user/175823 "View user profile.")
author: Renaissance Man

comments.content:
Helvetica Inserat appears to be a likely candidate:  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/helvetica-inserat/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317171503/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/helvetica-inserat/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/helvetica-inserat/")
